text.0: pour on us with thy juice all kinds of corn each sort of nourishment.
text.2: as thine o indu is the praise and thine what springeth from the juice.
text.3: seat thee on the dear sacred grass.
text.4: and finding for us kine and steeds o soma with thy juice flow on.
text.5: through days that fly most rapidly.
text.6: as one who conquers neer subdued attacks and stays the enemy.
